mdRecord.dcterms:title: 5619-Tomb of America's greatest citizen. Washington at Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of George Washington's tomb at Mount Vernon. Several visitors stand near the entrance. Mounted on gray board. The publisher's imprint on the front of the card reads: European Publishers Underwood & Underwood (London) Ltd. Underwood & Underwood, Sun Sculpture Trademark. New York & Ottawa, Kas. Works, Arlington, N.J. Title - Tomb of America's greatest citizen. Washington at Mount Vernon, Va. copyright Underwood & Underwood. U-186001. Printed directly onto the back of the mount is a brief history of the estate and the title of the stereograph in English, French, German, Spanish, Norwegian and Russian.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: George Washington, 1732-1799--Tomb
